snippet: Fans can visit PGA.com to vote for one of four hole locations on Oak Hill’s par-3 15th hole for Sunday’s final round of the P.G.A. Championship.
abstract: Dave Anderson Sports of The Times column notes that fans can visit PGA.com to vote for one of four hole locations on Oak Hill Country Club's par-3, 181-yard 15th hole in the final round of the PGA Championship; says that more than 40,000 votes have been recorded since July 23.
lead_paragraph: Fans can visit PGA.com to vote for one of four hole locations on Oak Hill’s par-3 15th hole for Sunday’s final round of the P.G.A. Championship.

headline.main: Where to Place the Hole on No. 15? Fans Can Vote on It
headline.print_headline: Where to Place the Hole on No. 15? Vote on It
